channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Sarah Tavel, Benchmark’s first woman GP, transitions to venture partner
item.description: Eight years after joining Benchmark as the firm’s first woman general partner, Sarah Tavel announced on X that she is transitioning to a more limited ...

item.title: X is rolling out support for 4K video uploads
item.description: X is now allowing select creators to upload videos in 4K resolution, and will roll out the feature to all premium subscribers soon.

item.title: Microsoft CEO says up to 30% of the company’s code was written by AI
item.description: Microsoft CEO Satya Nadella said that 20%-30% of code inside the company’s repositories was “written by software” — meaning AI — during a fireside cha...

item.title: OpenAI explains why ChatGPT became too sycophantic
item.description: OpenAI has published a postmortem on the recent sycophancy issues with the default AI model powering ChatGPT, GPT-4o — issues that forced the company ...

item.title: Meta’s LlamaCon was all about undercutting OpenAI
item.description: On Tuesday, Meta held its first-ever AI developer conference, LlamaCon, at its Menlo Park, California headquarters. The company announced the launch o...

item.title: Trump’s Policies Are Creating Uncertainty for Fossil Fuel Companies
item.description: The Trump administration aims to make fossil fuels cheap—so cheap they wouldn’t be worth extracting. “‘Drill, baby, drill’ is nothing short of a myth,...

item.title: 12 Best Delivery Chocolate Boxes to Send and Receive (2025)
item.description: We tasted dozens of chocolate boxes to find the best, from pure chocolate ecstasy to bundles of fun.

item.title: The 45 Best Shows on Hulu Right Now (May 2025)
item.description: Dying for Sex, The Handmaid’s Tale, and A Thousand Blows are just a few of the shows you should be watching on Hulu this month.

item.title: WhatsApp Is Walking a Tightrope Between AI Features and Privacy

item.title: States and Startups Are Suing the US Nuclear Regulatory Commission
item.description: Critics of the NRC say its red tape and lengthy authorization timelines stifle innovation, but handing some of its responsibilities to states could un...
